title: Ranks Without Number (4U170)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns an ally to a skirmish, you may play an [Isengard] minion from your discard pile. That minion's twilight cost is -2.
Lore:	”'All Isengard must be emptied….'”
Rarity:	U
